concept.title: Web service WSDL
concept.shortdesc: A web service exposes its own WSDL once it is deployed.

conbody.p: For instance, if there is a service at the URL:
the WSDL description is at the URL:
http://localhost:9082/CuramWS/services returns a web page that lists all web services deployed and a link to their WSDL files.
The general URL format of the locations above is as follows: http://<web-server>:<port-number>/<ServerModelName>WS/services/<BPO-name>.
